title: siva raama krishhNaa
sahitya:
shiva raama krishna

gOvinda nara hari naaraayaNaa

kaasi vishwanaatha 



caraNam 1



pandari puravaasa shri paanduranga 

chidambaresha shri nataraaja 

Natajana paalaka nava graha roopaa 

parvati sukumaara ganapati skanda



caraNam 2



kaamaakshi meenaakshi kaasi visaalaakshi 

jagadamba shaarada lakshmi gowri 

bhuvaneshvari raajaraajeshwari shivasankari parameshwari 

aadi paraashakti akhilandeshwari(2)



caraNam 3



anjana sukumaara shree aanjanEya 

mantraalaya vaasa shree raaghavEndra 

guruvaayoor puravaasa guruvaayoorappa 

shabarimalai vaasa sharaNam ayyappa!


madhyama kaalam


matsya koorma tara dasa vida roopa
adi suba daayaka ananda roopa
cangu cakra dhara tirupati vaasa
kaliyuga varada shri gOvinda
viswanaata naaraayana narahari
govinda krishna 
(shiva raama)
